company_name: TISSAT (TECNOLOGIA E INGENIERIA DE SISTEMAS Y SERVICIOS AVANZADOS DE TELECOMUNICACIONES, SOCIEDAD ANONIMA)
page_content:
TISSAT (TECNOLOGIA E INGENIERIA DE SISTEMAS Y SERVICIOS AVANZADOS DE TELECOMUNICACIONES, SOCIEDAD ANONIMA)

Cloud Object Storage as IaaS

Any type objects are stored in a secure, reliable, high-redundant and privacy compliant Cloud: 3 copies of objects are stored in different places, but you pay only for one, without additional charge for data traffic. Thought up for API access from customer applications, but sftp access and others are available.

Features

  • Redundacy&availability: 3 copies of objects are stored (only one billed)
  • 2. Reliability+availability plus: hosted in Tier-IV DataCenter in EuropeanUnion
  • “Single-DataCenter” or “Multi-DataCenter” storage options (always in the European Union).
  • EU Privacy laws compliancy
  • No charge for data traffic or bandwidth
  • Specially thought up for API access from customer applications
  • Besides, access from CLI and/or Graphical Management Dashboard
  • Access via “sftp” client (ftp and others) is also possible
  • Real time usage metrics
  • 24h*365d Service Desk Support

Benefits

  • Pay-per-use (the storage really used, not reserved quotes)
  • Neither data traffic charge nor traffic limitation
  • Service and operations are IS0-27001 & ISO-20000 certified
  • Underlying DataCentres located in EuropeanUnion and operated by European company
  • Open and Interoperable (based on OpenStack): No vendor lock-in
  • Open RESTful API available for User's Application provisioning & management
  • Portable: move your applications to another OpenStack based IaaS
  • Energy Efficiency: ISO-50001, ISO-14001 & EU Conduct Code for DataCentres
  • Ready for Hybrid Cloud deployment
  • Completely authentic Cloud IaaS, according to NIST & UK definition

Pricing

£0.05 to £0.075 per gigabyte per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial option available
